scripts.fserve: rm -rf dist && rm -rf nuxt && rm -rf functions/nuxt && npm run build && cp -r nuxt/ functions/nuxt/ && cp nuxt.config.js functions/ && rm -rf public/* && cp -r nuxt/dist/client public/_nuxt && cp -a static/. public/
scripts.liveserve: npm run fserve && rm -rf public/* && cp -r nuxt/dist/client public/_nuxt && cp -a static/. public/
scripts.deploylocal: npm run liveserve && sudo firebase serve --only hosting,functions -p 5000
scripts.deploylive: npm run liveserve && firebase deploy --only hosting,functions
